response.overview: A father / his son; a husband / his wife; a man / his profession. This film demonstrates how work can influence the combinatorial possibilities between these elements.  If we add that this man is my father and this woman is my mother, we can consider that DES CHIFFRES ET DES CHIFFRES is, in its own way, a family film.  There is a lot of talk about work, the very close retirement, the daily mistakes that made three people who lived under the same roof for almost 30 years miss each other.  Despite everything, it is an impression of mutual tenderness and love that marks the aftertaste of this film with a very accurate tone, sometimes touching and sometimes funny.
response.title: DES CHIFFRES ET DES CHIFFRES
